mapper.insert: insert into customer_sign_time_history (id, sign_id, appoint_time, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, version) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{signId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appointTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 0)

mapper.update:
update customer_sign_time_history
sign_id = #{signId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
appoint_time = #{appointTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_time = now(), version = version+1
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update customer_sign_time_history set sign_id = #{signId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, appoint_time = #{appointTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_time = now(), version = version+1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}
